00052 /**
00053  * Factory class for making chip streams based on a string representation. 
00054  */
00055 class ChipStreamFactory {
00056 
00057 public:
00058 
00059   /** 
00060    * @brief Constructor. Registers the objects we know how to create and how
00061    * they describe themselves.
00062    */  
00063   ChipStreamFactory();
00064 
00065   /** 
00066    * @brief Create a pointer to a new ChipStream object as described
00067    * in the string specification.
00068    * @param spec - Specification string i.e. quant-norm.sketch=1000000
00069    * 
00070    * @return Pointer to new ChipStream objects, must be deleted when
00071    * finished.
00072    */
00073   ChipStream *cStreamForString(const std::string &spec);
00074 
00075   /** 
00076    * Set the distribution for doing quantile normalizations.
00077    * @param sketch - distribution to normalize to.
00078    */
00079   void setTargetSketch(const std::vector<float> &sketch) {
00080     m_TargetSketch = sketch;
00081   }
00082 
00083   /** 
00084    * Get the skize of the sketch distribution for doing quantile normalizations
00085    */
00086   int getTargetSketchSize() {
00087       return m_TargetSketch.size() > 0 ? int(m_TargetSketch.size()) : -1;
00088   }
00089 
00090   /** 
00091    * Set the annotaiton-file
00092    * @param str - the annotation file name
00093    */
00094   void setAnnotationFileName(const std::string& str) {m_strAnnotationFileName = str;}
00095 
00096   /** 
00097    * Toggle whether or not we're writing out the normalization
00098    * distribution.
00099    * @param writeSketch - true to write out the distrubtion false
00100    * otherwise.
00101    */
00102   void setWriteSketchDir(const std::string &writeSketchDir) {
00103     m_WriteSketchDir = writeSketchDir;
00104   }
00105   void setWriteSketchDir_a5(const std::string &writeSketchDir) {
00106     // printf("### setWriteSketchDir_a5('%s')\n",writeSketchDir.c_str());
00107     m_WriteSketchDir_a5 = writeSketchDir;
00108   }
00109   void setWriteSketchGroup_a5(affx::File5_Group* group5) {
00110     // printf("### setWriteSketchDir_a5('%s')\n",writeSketchDir.c_str());
00111     m_WriteSketchGroup_a5 = group5;
00112   }
00113 
00114   // toggle whether we're writing the normalization dist
00115   // passed down one level from AnalysisFactory
00116   void setWriteProfileDir(const std::string &writeProfileDir){
00117           m_WriteProfileDir = writeProfileDir;
00118   }
00119 
00120   void setreadReferenceProfile(const std::string &readProfile){
00121           m_ReadProfile= readProfile;
00122   }
00123 
00124   void setProbesForNorm(const std::vector<int> &probeIds) {
00125     m_NormProbes = probeIds;
00126   }
00127 
00128   void readNormProbesFromFile(const std::string& fileName);
00129 
00130 
00131   /** 
00132    * @brief Factory for making ChipStreams from a string description. 
00133    * 
00134    * @param spec - Specification in form "chipstream.key=value.key=value"
00135    * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00136    * @param description - name of chipstream path so far.
00137    * @return ChipStream requested.
00138    */
00139   ChipStream *chipStreamForString(const std::string &spec, ChipLayout &layout, const std::string &description);
00140 
00141   /** 
00142    * @brief Factory for making ChipStreams from a string description. 
00143    * 
00144    * @param board - Blackboard with program state.
00145    * @param spec - Specification in form "chipstream.key=value.key=value"
00146    * @param description - name of chipstream path so far.
00147    * @return ChipStream requested.
00148    */
00149    ChipStream *chipStreamForStringBoard(PsBoard &board,
00150                                         const std::string &spec, 
00151                                         const std::string &description);
00152   
00153   /** 
00154    * Open and read a target distribution from a text file. Must have a column
00155    * called 'intensities' with distribution quantiles sorted from highest to 
00156    * lowest.
00157    * 
00158    * @param fileName - text file containing column of quantiles.
00159    */
00160   void readTargetSketchFromFile(const std::string& fileName);
00161   void readTargetSketchFromFile_a5(const std::string& fileName);
00162   void readTargetSketchFromFile_a5_tsv(affx::File5_Group* group5,
00163                                        const std::string& name);
00164   /** 
00165    * Get the vector of documentation objects that this factory is aware of.
00166    * @return - vector of documentation objects.
00167    */
00168   std::vector<SelfDoc> getDocs() {
00169     return m_Docs;
00170   }
00171 
00172   /** 
00173    * Set the probes to be used as a background distribution.
00174    * @param controlProbes - probes to use as controls.
00175    */
00176   void setControlProbes(const std::vector<Probe *> controlProbes) {
00177     m_GcControlProbes = controlProbes;
00178   }
00179   
00180   void setCelFileCount(unsigned int ui) {m_uiCelFileCount = ui;}
00181 
00182   /** 
00183    * Can this factory be used to build from this specification?
00184    * @param spec - Specification in form "chipstream.key=value.key=value"
00185    * @return true if this factory knows how to build from this specification, false otherwise
00186    */
00187   bool canBuild(const std::string &spec);
00188  
00189 protected:
00190 
00191   /// Should we write out our normalization distribution.
00192   std::string m_WriteSketchDir;
00193   std::string m_WriteSketchDir_a5;
00194   affx::File5_Group* m_WriteSketchGroup_a5;
00195 
00196   /// Should we write out our normalization distribution.
00197   // This is passed from the AnalysisFactory level
00198   std::string m_WriteProfileDir;
00199   std::string m_WriteProfileDir_a5;
00200   affx::File5_Group* m_WriteProfileGroup_a5;
00201 
00202   // this level should know nothing about profiles, only files
00203   // This is passed from the AnalysisFactory level
00204   std::string m_ReadProfile;
00205 
00206   
00207   /// Distribution to normalize data to.  
00208   std::vector<float> m_TargetSketch;      
00209   /// Probes to use for normalization.
00210   std::vector<int> m_NormProbes;
00211   /// Self documentation
00212   std::vector<SelfDoc> m_Docs;
00213   /// Self creation
00214   std::vector<SelfCreate::selfCreator> m_Creators;
00215   /// Background probes to use. Note that memory is owned elsewhere.
00216   std::vector<Probe *> m_GcControlProbes;
00217   /// annotaiton-file
00218   std::string m_strAnnotationFileName;
00219   /// intensity-reporter.file
00220   std::string m_strIntensityReporterFileName;
00221 
00222   unsigned int m_uiCelFileCount;
00223 };

00225 #endif /* _CHIPSTREAMFACTORY_H_ */
